com.iopipe.plugin.profiler

Class MemoryUsageStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iopipe.plugin.profiler.MemoryUsageStatistics

  • public final class MemoryUsageStatistics
extends Object
    This stores a single memory usage statistic.
    Since:
    2018/05/23
